title: Pedagogical Approaches Utilizing Virtual and Physical Manipulatives in Elementary Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics concepts and knowledge at the introductory elementary education level
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to master lesson design and implementation using diverse mathematical manipulatives, conducting project collaborations in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Design and demonstrate three or more teaching strategies for elementary mathematics concepts (addition, subtraction, fractions, geometry, etc.) using virtual and physical manipulatives
Develop instructional materials that promote students' problem-solving and reasoning skills through manipulative-based inquiry learning activities
Propose effective lesson plans for utilizing smartphone-compatible virtual manipulative tools in limited-technology environments

resources: Set of diverse physical manipulatives (blocks, fraction tiles, etc.)
List of mobile-friendly virtual manipulative software
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
